entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to break into the vault. He asks the goblin for help.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is also present in the scene.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another one of Harry's friends who is present in the scene.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is a guardian of Gringotts and has a duty to protect the objects placed in their care.

relationships.description: Harry asks the goblin for help in breaking into the vault.
The goblin is a guardian of Gringotts and has a duty to protect its treasures.
